name: places/ChIJoQ2lC41ZwokRi6ApTaSV_mY
formattedAddress: 2 Charlton St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2 Charlton St, New York, NY 10014-4909, USA

originalText.text:
Quite simply the best shoe repair I've encountered in NYC. I like John Fluevog shoes quite a bit. They last forever but the way I use them the heels are a mess in a few months of walking around NYC. I've taken the boots to a number of places in the last few years but finally Fluevog's staff told me about Drago Shoe Repair.

The work has been done to perfection. They rebuilt heels, fixed another pair of my girlfriend's boots that she found in a thrift store so that they look like new. Not a drop of glue out of place, they  look better than ever.

I highly recommend them!

originalText.text: My old faithful brown leather boots , I thought, were pretty done. I've had them cleaned and conditioned by two other cobblers in the past and I can't be more happy with the results from Drago. They also replaced one worn sole. I had another pair of shoes stretched and zipper of a few bags. All great!

text.text: My old faithful brown leather boots , I thought, were pretty done. I've had them cleaned and conditioned by two other cobblers in the past and I can't be more happy with the results from Drago. They also replaced one worn sole. I had another pair of shoes stretched and zipper of a few bags. All great!

originalText.text: I dropped off two pairs of boots—one repair was simple and the other more complicated and the first guy wasn’t sure how to fix the complicated one and said the cobbler was going to follow up with a call in the afternoon. Not only did they not call (after 4 days), they don’t pick up their phone. When I went in to the shop, they couldn’t find my boots (I had the ticket).  Turns out it was because they were just sitting to the side.. totally neglected.

originalText.text: i’ve been going to drago with various shoes to be repaired for several years. maybe a decade? i don’t even remember how i stumbled across the shop, but i consider myself lucky for having done so! i trust them and respect their work. prices, friendliness, speed, and quality are all unbeatable IMO. priceless. maybe you expect to pay less elsewhere (?) but you’d probably sacrifice one thing or another for it ;) highest recommendation from me!

originalText.text: I've been going to drago for 9 years!  Drago has fixed many of my shoes. The only guy I trust to fix my shoes. Always good price and fast.
